name: LemWars
description:
LemWars
Deep down the hill there are endless wars between anthropomorphic lemmings. The Emperor has appointed you as commander-in-chief of the army, do not let him down! Under your command there are thousands of volunteers ready to fight without sparing their lives. Build a well-adjusted war machine where every soldier knows his place. Reinforce your checkpoints, seize new lands, do not give the enemy hope of victory!

Features:
  • Side-scrolling real time strategy with destructible randomly generated maps.
  • Full customization of units (settings of weapons, ammunition, behavior) and a unique system of squads.
  • The widest arsenal of weapons with its own strengths and weaknesses.
  • A rich selection of buildings and traps to strengthen your army.
  • Lots of settings for a variety of gameplay experiences.
